english.segment1: Keep it tight, it's all right. Everybody's on down the boulevard tonight. Say, it's OK, looking for a beam and a place to be yeah. I want you to sow right through ya, Keep the light on your shoulder. Sometimes life's just a crawl I know it. It's almost got enough of me.
